summary: This is an email from March 7, 2020, discussing a review of records from Interlochen. It reveals that Jeffrey Epstein paid the summer camp tuition for a specific student. The email notes the student was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Ghislaine Maxwell and Epstein, and expresses a desire to interview her, providing a link to the podcast.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Revealed to have paid the summer camp tuition for a student at Interlochen. The student was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with him and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the student had dealings with, alongside Jeffrey Epstein, as discussed in a podcast interview.

connections.description: Both are mentioned as having dealings with the same student, who discussed them in a podcast interview.

events.title: Email Review of Interlochen Records
events.description: An email is sent discussing the review of records from Interlochen, which revealed Epstein paid a student's summer camp tuition. The email expresses a desire to interview this student.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein paid the summer camp tuition for a specific student at Interlochen.
The student was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
The email sender expresses a desire to interview this student as part of an investigation.
The document is an email dated March 7, 2020, indicating ongoing investigative activity at that time.
